title: New Route Announced
content: A new route from NYC to Tokyo has been announced.

title: Delay Notice
content: Flight DL454 will be delayed by 2 hours due to weather.

title: Gate Changed
content: Flight UA123 will now depart from Gate G4.

content: Flight DL456 now offers free Wi-Fi for all passengers.

title: Meal Service Update
content: Flight DL454 will now include a complimentary meal service.

title: Schedule Adjustment
content: Flight UA123's departure time has been adjusted by 30 minutes.
